Uses of Package
com.esotericsoftware.kryo

    com.esotericsoftware.kryo

  • Classes in com.esotericsoftware.kryo used by com.esotericsoftware.kryo 
    Class and Description
    ClassResolver
    Handles class registration, writing class identifiers to bytes, and reading class identifiers from bytes.
    Generics
    Helper class to map type name variables to concrete classes that are used during instantiation
    Kryo
    Maps classes to serializers so object graphs can be serialized automatically.
    ReferenceResolver
    When references are enabled, this tracks objects that have already been read or written, provides an ID for objects that are written, and looks up by ID objects that have been read.
    Registration
    Describes the Serializer and class ID to use for a class.
    Serializer
    Reads and writes objects to and from bytes.
    StreamFactory
    Provides input and output streams based on system settings.
  • Classes in com.esotericsoftware.kryo used by com.esotericsoftware.kryo.factories 
    Class and Description
    Kryo
    Maps classes to serializers so object graphs can be serialized automatically.

  • Classes in com.esotericsoftware.kryo used by com.esotericsoftware.kryo.io 
    Class and Description
    KryoException
    General Kryo RuntimeException.
  • Classes in com.esotericsoftware.kryo used by com.esotericsoftware.kryo.serializers 
    Class and Description
    Generics
    Helper class to map type name variables to concrete classes that are used during instantiation
    Kryo
    Maps classes to serializers so object graphs can be serialized automatically.
    KryoSerializable
    Allows implementing classes to perform their own serialization.
    Serializer
    Reads and writes objects to and from bytes.
